TEXT.P: Press the buttons to toggle between graphs of conversion efficiency and production efficiency.

Both graphs contain the same information, just presented in a different fashion. The graph of conversion efficiency is easier to interpret. For example, looking at the value for eggs, you can see that you get roughly 1/3 kilogram of eggs for every kilogram of feed consumed by the hens.
Answer questions 2 through 4 in the assignment based on these graphs.
When you have finished, proceed to Step 3.
